      public static void Displayformat(Card a, Card b, Card c, Card d, Card e, Card f, int x, int y)
      Displays the cards and the total points for the player and the dealer.
      Parameters:
      playerH - the first card of the player
      compH - the first card of the dealer
      playerH1 - the second card of the player
      compH1 - the second card of the dealer
      playerH3 - the third card of the player
      compH3 - the third card of the dealer
      totalP - the total points of the player
      totalC - the total points of the dealer
